Name: Spooky Cats
About the game: Oh no! This cute little kitty cat is alone and lost in a haunted house! Only by collecting pennies, saving a girl named Penny, and defeating monsters can she find the way out! Use your fast fingers to defeat this adorably dark and funny platform game. Dis game is so scawwwy! Includes Xbox gamepad support (if supported by your OS). YouTube Let's Play/Reviewers : Feel free to use Spooky Cats gameplay in your online monetized videos.
